participant_1.background:
I can't seem to avoid tripping over my own feet.
I enjoy exercising and try to work out as often as I can, but it can be hard to find the time, especially with my night shift schedule.
I love my Acara, it's round and comfortable.
I'm going to watch the Nascar race on Sunday and then pretend to be a superhero with my kids.
I spent most of last year in my workshop, building furniture.

participant_2.background:
I've been watching a lot of tv since I quit my job.
there i m a general of an orcish army.
I neglect my health for the sake of my job.
I live in a quiet neighborhood with my dog.
I enjoy using my imagination to create new worlds and characters.

content.text: Hi! What are you up to today?
Not much, just watching some TV. What about you?
I'm working on a project. I'm a furniture maker and I'm building a new table.
That's awesome! Do you have pictures? I love seeing people's creative work.
Sure, I'll send you some. I'm working on this cool new design that I think you'll like.
Awesome! Can't wait to see it.
Here you go! What do you think?
That's so cool! I love the design. You're really talented.
Thanks! I appreciate it. I'm glad you like it.
I'm so impressed! I wish I was that creative.
Thanks! It's really just a matter of practice.
I think I'll need a lot of practice then.
It's not as hard as you think. Just start with something simple and see where it takes you.
Good luck! I'm sure you'll do great.
